definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The pro-slavery legislature passed a bill calling for such a convention.
sentences.chinese: 支持奴隶制的立法会通过了要求召开制宪会议的法案。

sentences.english: Judicial accounting technology is a specialism means to investigate and prosecute economic crime case.
sentences.chinese: 司法会计技术是查办经济犯罪案件的专门手段。

sentences.english: But it isn't hard to foresee how visionary circadian-clock therapies might work.
sentences.chinese: 但是不难预见想象的生物钟治疗法会怎样起作用。

sentences.english: and (6) To exercise other powers and functions as prescribed in the rules of procedure of the Legislative Council.
sentences.chinese: 立法会议事规则所规定的其他职权。

sentences.english: Chinese New Year Eve chanting, praying for longevity, Lion dance, tea party.
sentences.chinese: 农历年除夕延生法会，舞狮，茶叙。

sentences.english: The bureau also has regular dialogue with the Legislative Council's Panel on Transport.
sentences.chinese: 运输局更定期与立法会的交通事务委员会交换意见。

sentences.english: The Chief Executive must consult the Executive Council before dissolving the Legislative Council.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官在解散立法会前，须征询行政会议的意见。

sentences.english: As most people are habitual chest breathers, chest breathing can lead to headaches, fatigue, anxiety and even panic attacks.
sentences.chinese: 胸部呼吸法会造成头疼，疲劳，焦虑甚至恐慌发作。

sentences.english: Half of the new legislative seats would be directly elected.
sentences.chinese: 新的立法会议席中半数将直接选举产生。

sentences.english: In fact, the work of the Legislative Council is closely related to the daily life of Hong Kong people.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，立法会的工作与香港市民日常生活息息相关。

sentences.english: Mr Tsang says Hong Kong is nowhere near finding consensus on reforming the legislature.
sentences.chinese: 梁家杰说，香港就改革立法会远远没有找到共识。

sentences.english: The DAB is the largest political party in Legco.
sentences.chinese: 民建联是立法会内的最大政党。

sentences.english: Gold Sage Monastery will arrange bus tour for same-day travel.
sentences.chinese: 金圣寺将安排巴士前往圣城参加法会。

sentences.english: Lawmaker Emily Lau Wai-hing's offices have been subjected to an arson attack and smeared with faeces .
sentences.chinese: 立法会议员刘慧卿的办公室也被纵火和泼粪。

sentences.english: Opposition lawmakers hold 23 of the 60 seats.
sentences.chinese: 反对派议员在立法会的60席中占23席。

sentences.english: Chapter VI Summary and outlook judicial accounting development prospects in China.
sentences.chinese: 第六章总结和展望司法会计在我国的发展前景。

definition: (Buddhism) to initiate sb for monkhood or nunhood
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
to feed the starving ghosts (i.e. offer sacrifice to protect the departed spirit)
